metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5197 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Additionand removal of rules from chain bindings within the same transaction causesleads to use-after-free. We recommend upgrading past commitf15f29fd4779be8a418b66e9d52979bb6d6c2325.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-10-generic - 6.5.0-10.10
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-10-generic - 6.5.0-10.10
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-10-generic-64k - 6.5.0-10.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-aws - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-azure - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-gcp - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-10-lowlatency - 6.5.0-10.10.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-10-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-10.10.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1011-oracle - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1006-raspi - 6.5.0-1006.8
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1003-starfive - 6.5.0-1003.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-laptop - 6.5.0-1005.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-10.10').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1009.9').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1008.8').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1008.8').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needed').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-10.10.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.11').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1006.8').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.4').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1005.8').
